ps2.10:1.2.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.

ps2.10:1.3.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

ps2.10:1.4.pli: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—

ps2.10:2.2.pli: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, ‘suñño loko’ti vuccatī”ti?

ps2.10:2.3.pli: “Yasmā kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā, tasmā ‘suñño loko’ti vuccati.

ps2.10:2.4.pli: Kiñcānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā?

ps2.10:2.5.pli: Cakkhu kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:2.6.pli: Rūpā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:2.7.pli: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:2.8.pli: Cakkhusamphasso suñño attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:2.9.pli: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:3.9.pli: mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:3.10.pli: Dhammā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:3.11.pli: Manoviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:3.12.pli: Manosamphasso suñño attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:3.13.pli: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.

ps2.10:3.14.pli: Yasmā kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā tasmā ‘suñño loko’ti vuccatī”ti.

ps2.10:4.1.pli: Suññasuññaṃ, saṅkhārasuññaṃ, vipariṇāmasuññaṃ, aggasuññaṃ, lakkhaṇasuññaṃ, vikkhambhanasuññaṃ, tadaṅgasuññaṃ, samucchedasuññaṃ, paṭippassaddhisuññaṃ, nissaraṇasuññaṃ, ajjhattasuññaṃ, bahiddhāsuññaṃ, dubhatosuññaṃ, sabhāgasuññaṃ, visabhāgasuññaṃ, esanāsuññaṃ, pariggahasuññaṃ, paṭilābhasuññaṃ, paṭivedhasuññaṃ, ekattasuññaṃ, nānattasuññaṃ, khantisuññaṃ, adhiṭṭhānasuññaṃ, pariyogāhaṇasuññaṃ, sampajānassa pavattapariyādānaṃ sabbasuññatānaṃ paramatthasuññaṃ. [25]

ps2.10:5.2.pli: Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:5.7.pli: mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:6.4.pli: Puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhārena ca āneñjābhisaṅkhārena ca suñño.

ps2.10:6.5.pli: Apuññābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhārena ca āneñjābhisaṅkhārena ca suñño.

ps2.10:6.6.pli: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhārena ca apuññābhisaṅkhārena ca suñño.

ps2.10:7.3.pli: Kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhārena ca cittasaṅkhārena ca suñño.

ps2.10:7.4.pli: Vacīsaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhārena ca cittasaṅkhārena ca suñño.

ps2.10:7.5.pli: Cittasaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhārena ca vacīsaṅkhārena ca suñño.

ps2.10:8.2.pli: atītā saṅkhārā, anāgatā saṅkhārā, paccuppannā saṅkhārā.

ps2.10:8.3.pli: Atītā saṅkhārā anāgatehi ca paccuppannehi ca saṅkhārehi suññā.

ps2.10:8.4.pli: Anāgatā saṅkhārā atītehi ca paccuppannehi ca saṅkhārehi suññā paccuppannā saṅkhārā atītehi ca anāgatehi ca saṅkhārehi suññā.

ps2.10:9.5.pli: Vigatā vedanā vipariṇatā ceva suññā ca …pe…

ps2.10:9.11.pli: Vigato bhavo vipariṇato ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:10.2.pli: Aggametaṃ padaṃ seṭṭhametaṃ padaṃ visiṭṭhametaṃ padaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.

ps2.10:11.8.pli: Uppādalakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:11.9.pli: Vayalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ, ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca vayalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:12.1.pli: Rūpassa uppādalakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:12.2.pli: Rūpassa vayalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:12.3.pli: Rūpassa ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca vayalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:12.9.pli: jarāmaraṇassa uppādalakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:12.10.pli: Jarāmaraṇassa vayalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:12.11.pli: Jarāmaraṇassa ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca vayalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.

ps2.10:13.2.pli: Nekkhammena kāmacchando vikkhambhito ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:13.3.pli: Abyāpādena byāpādo vikkhambhito ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:13.6.pli: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:13.7.pli: Ñāṇena avijjā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:13.8.pli: Pāmojjena arati vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:13.9.pli: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca …pe…

ps2.10:13.10.pli: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:15.2.pli: Nekkhammena kāmacchando samucchinno ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:15.3.pli: Abyāpādena byāpādo samucchinno ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:15.6.pli: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:15.7.pli: Ñāṇena avijjā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:15.8.pli: Pāmojjena arati samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:15.9.pli: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca …pe…

ps2.10:15.10.pli: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:16.2.pli: Nekkhammena kāmacchando paṭippassaddho ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:16.3.pli: Abyāpādena byāpādo paṭippassaddho ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:16.6.pli: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:16.7.pli: Ñāṇena avijjā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:16.8.pli: Pāmojjena arati paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:16.9.pli: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca …pe…

ps2.10:16.10.pli: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:17.2.pli: Nekkhammena kāmacchando nissaṭo ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:17.3.pli: Abyāpādena byāpādo nissaṭo ceva suñño ca.

ps2.10:17.6.pli: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:17.7.pli: Ñāṇena avijjā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:17.8.pli: Pāmojjena arati nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:17.9.pli: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca …pe…

ps2.10:17.10.pli: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:18.2.pli: Ajjhattaṃ cakkhuṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:18.7.pli: ajjhattaṃ mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:19.3.pli: bahiddhā dhammā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:20.2.pli: Yañca ajjhattaṃ cakkhu ye ca bahiddhā rūpā ubhayametaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:20.3.pli: Yañca ajjhattaṃ sotaṃ ye ca bahiddhā saddā …pe…

ps2.10:20.4.pli: yañca ajjhattaṃ ghānaṃ ye ca bahiddhā gandhā …

ps2.10:20.5.pli: yā ca ajjhattaṃ jivhā ye ca bahiddhā rasā …

ps2.10:20.6.pli: yo ca ajjhattaṃ kāyo ye ca bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbā …

ps2.10:20.7.pli: yo ca ajjhattaṃ mano ye ca bahiddhā dhammā ubhayametaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.

ps2.10:21.2.pli: Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni sabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.

ps2.10:21.3.pli: Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni sabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.

ps2.10:21.4.pli: Cha viññāṇakāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:21.5.pli: Cha phassakāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:21.6.pli: Cha vedanākāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:21.7.pli: Cha saññākāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:21.8.pli: Cha cetanākāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:22.2.pli: Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni chahi bāhirehi āyatanehi visabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.

ps2.10:22.3.pli: Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni chahi viññāṇakāyehi visabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.

ps2.10:22.4.pli: Cha viññāṇakāyā chahi phassakāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:22.5.pli: Cha phassakāyā chahi vedanākāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:22.6.pli: Cha vedanākāyā chahi saññākāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:22.7.pli: Cha saññākāyā chahi cetanākāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.

ps2.10:31.2.pli: Idha sampajāno nekkhammena kāmacchandassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, abyāpādena byāpādassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, avikkhepena uddhaccassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchāya pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, ñāṇena avijjāya pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, pāmojjena aratiyā pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ pavattaṃ pariyādiyati …pe…

ps2.10:31.4.pli: Atha vā pana sampajānassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa idaṃ ceva cakkhupavattaṃ pariyādiyati, aññañca cakkhupavattaṃ na uppajjati.

ps2.10:31.9.pli: manopavattaṃ pariyādiyati, aññañca manopavattaṃ na uppajjati.

ps2.10:32.5.pli: Esa nikāyadharehi ṭhapito, asamo dutiyo pavaro varavaggoti.
